StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllQSNRUCs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT MO.PRESENT_RUC AS RUC, MO.UNIT_NAME, MO.PRESENT_MCC AS MCC_CODE, (SELECT TOP 1 QSN.MCC_CODE FROM QSN WHERE QSN.RUC = MO.PRESENT_RUC ORDER BY QSN.UPDATE_DATE DESC) AS QSN_MCC FROM MARINE_ORGANIZATION MO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QSN WHERE QSN.RUC = MO.PRESENT_RUC) ORDER BY MO.PRESENT_RUC, MO.UNIT_NAME
